segments.text: I just can't get over the woman's absolute tunnel vision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously polishing a plate, seemingly in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing just inches from her, yet she doesn't budge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the water rising around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frankly infuriating to see such a lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her children are literally risking a fall for cookies right behind her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be aware of her surroundings, especially with kids present.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence could lead to serious injury or damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised she hasn't looked up or reacted to the splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an ordinary domestic scene, yet so much is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not sense the chaos unfolding around her?
segments.speaker: PAR
